attributes.action: Address every UK employer to Arrange for Work from Home to save Many Lives.
attributes.additional_details:
I’ve been seeing Thousands of NON-ESSENTIAL shops open, & also hearing several friends who HAVE worked from home during the 2020 Lockdown but this time, the Employers are NOT allowing them to work from home for the reason that “1000’s of other Britons are working at office too, you’re no different & need to come”.
I would like to request the Govt. to address every UK employer to Arrange for their colleagues to work from home except ‘Really Essential’ ones to help Save Many Lives of the UK.
attributes.background:
Thousands of employers are asking their employees to work at office when they CAN work from home for the simple reason that “others are in office too”, & buses are running FULL.
This should be addressed IMMEDIATELY to help stop the spread of the new Coronavirus variant/ strain and save many lives.
